Interface IProjectManagement

public interface IProjectManagement
Interface for managing project operations in the BTO Management System.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      boolean createProject(String projectName, String neighborhood, List<FlatType> flatTypes, List<Integer> numberOfUnits, List<Double> sellingPrices, Date openingDate, Date closingDate, HDBManager manager, int officerSlots)
      Creates a new BTO project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      neighborhood - The neighborhood of the project
      flatTypes - The types of flats available in the project
      numberOfUnits - The number of units for each flat type
      sellingPrices - The selling prices for each flat type
      openingDate - The application opening date
      closingDate - The application closing date
      manager - The manager in charge of the project
      officerSlots - The number of officer slots for the project
      Returns:
      true if the project was successfully created, false otherwise

    • updateProject

      boolean updateProject(Project project, String projectName, String neighborhood, List<FlatType> flatTypes, List<Integer> numberOfUnits, List<Double> sellingPrices, Date openingDate, Date closingDate, int officerSlots)
      Updates an existing BTO project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to update
      projectName - The new name of the project
      neighborhood - The new neighborhood of the project
      flatTypes - The new types of flats available in the project
      numberOfUnits - The new number of units for each flat type
      sellingPrices - The new selling prices for each flat type
      openingDate - The new application opening date
      closingDate - The new application closing date
      officerSlots - The new number of officer slots for the project
      Returns:
      true if the project was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • deleteProject

      boolean deleteProject(Project project)
      Deletes a BTO project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to delete
      Returns:
      true if the project was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      boolean toggleProjectVisibility(Project project, boolean visible)
      Toggles the visibility of a BTO project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to toggle visibility for
      visible - The new visibility status
      Returns:
      true if the visibility was successfully toggled, false otherwise

    • addOfficerToProject

      boolean addOfficerToProject(Project project, HDBOfficer officer)
      Adds an HDB officer to a project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to add the officer to
      officer - The officer to add
      Returns:
      true if the officer was successfully added, false otherwise

    • removeOfficerFromProject

      boolean removeOfficerFromProject(Project project, HDBOfficer officer)
      Removes an HDB officer from a project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to remove the officer from
      officer - The officer to remove
      Returns:
      true if the officer was successfully removed, false otherwise

    • getAllProjects

      List<Project> getAllProjects()
      Gets a list of all projects.
      Returns:
      A list of all projects

    • getProjectsByManager

      List<Project> getProjectsByManager(HDBManager manager)
      Gets a list of projects by manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager to get projects for
      Returns:
      A list of projects managed by the specified manager

    • getProjectsByNeighborhood

      List<Project> getProjectsByNeighborhood(String neighborhood)
      Gets a list of projects by neighborhood.
      Parameters:
      neighborhood - The neighborhood to get projects for
      Returns:
      A list of projects in the specified neighborhood

    • getProjectsByFlatType

      List<Project> getProjectsByFlatType(FlatType flatType)
      Gets a list of projects by flat type.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to get projects for
      Returns:
      A list of projects offering the specified flat type
